message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe would be a great fit for you. My asking price is $10,000, which I think is fair considering its value.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand the value of the item, but my budget is limited. Would you consider accepting $9,500 for the product?

Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a little bit, but $9,500 is still too low for me.  How about $9,750?  This would allow me to make a bit more while still giving you a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could you possibly lower the price to $9,500? This would be a win-win situation for both of us.
